review: Overall, it's nice to be able to stream the Amazon Prime benefit to my TV. I already have an Apple TV (and a smart blu-ray I don't use) to deliver my music, Netflix, and Hulu Plus so I didn't buy this for those.The biggest issue I've had with the device is that the wifi signal from the device significantly interferes with my HDTV antenna signal. I have a high-powered whole-house antenna with amplifier and I live in a major U.S. city, so reception isn't the issue. I finally pinned down the issue being the proximity of the stick to the coax connection on my TV. I can only use the stick if it is at least two feet from the back of the TV, which defeats the design.A few other issues with the device:- The interface is clunky and not easy to navigate- There doesn't appear to be an easy way to put the device to sleep - which is not energy efficient and contributed to my problem above- The Amazon images are a little misleading and do not include the power cord that the device needs to operate
